title: 'Sniper shot Trump with AR-style rifle from over 130 yards'
'Clearly see him with a rifle': Eyewitness of Trump attack who saw shooter and warned police
Video: Moment Donald Trump was attacked during rally
content: On Sunday, in Butler County, Pennsylvania, Trump's rally was disrupted by gunfire. Trump grimaced, clutching his ear as he bled after a bullet grazed him, then escorted offstage by Secret Service. Panic ensued, attendees fled, some recorded. Trump, wearing a MAGA cap, raised his fist and lamented on TruthSocial. One attendee and the shooter died.
summary: On Sunday, in Butler County, Pennsylvania, Trump's rally was disrupted by gunfire. Trump grimaced, clutching his ear as he bled after a bullet grazed him, then escorted offstage by Secret Service. Panic ensued, attendees fled, some recorded. Trump, wearing a MAGA cap, raised his fist and lamented on TruthSocial. One attendee and the shooter died.

title: 'It sounded like July 4 pops': Witnesses recount chaos at Trump rally after gun attack
content: Former US President Donald Trump's election campaign rally took an unexpected turn when a series of popping sounds caused the crowd of thousands to seek cover in a panic. The Secret Service agents acted swiftly to ensure the safety of the 78-year-old Republican, inadvertently knocking over the lectern bearing his name in their haste. As the agents helped Trump regain his footing, they quickly guided him towards his waiting motorcade.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump's election campaign rally took an unexpected turn when a series of popping sounds caused the crowd of thousands to seek cover in a panic. The Secret Service agents acted swiftly to ensure the safety of the 78-year-old Republican, inadvertently knocking over the lectern bearing his name in their haste. As the agents helped Trump regain his footing, they quickly guided him towards his waiting motorcade.

title: Biden press conference gets audience of 25.1 million viewers
Gunshots at former US President Donald Trump's rally; suspect, one attendee dead
content: Former President Trump was removed from a rally in Pennsylvania after gunshots were heard during a rally, with visible blood on his face. Law enforcement swiftly responded and rushed Trump off the stage. Later it was reported that the suspect and an one attendee are dead. Trump was reported safe and receiving medical attention. President Biden and former President Obama have commented on the incident, advocating for political civility and expressing relief at Trump's safety.
summary: Former President Trump was removed from a rally in Pennsylvania after gunshots were heard during a rally, with visible blood on his face. Law enforcement swiftly responded and rushed Trump off the stage. Later it was reported that the suspect and an one attendee are dead. Trump was reported safe and receiving medical attention. President Biden and former President Obama have commented on the incident, advocating for political civility and expressing relief at Trump's safety.

Bernie Sanders says Biden may not be ideal but he should be the candidate. Explains
content: ​"I strongly disagree with Mr. Biden on the question of U.S. support for Israel’s horrific war against the Palestinian people. The United States should not provide Benjamin Netanyahu’s right-wing extremist government with another nickel as it continues to create one of the worst humanitarian disasters in modern history," Bernie Sanders wrote.
summary: ​"I strongly disagree with Mr. Biden on the question of U.S. support for Israel’s horrific war against the Palestinian people. The United States should not provide Benjamin Netanyahu’s right-wing extremist government with another nickel as it continues to create one of the worst humanitarian disasters in modern history," Bernie Sanders wrote.

title: Rescuers recover body of Indian from two buses swept away in mudslide in Nepal
Trump worried people would find truth of Project 2025, says estranged niece
content: ​Donald Trump's estranged niece Mary Trump said her uncle was simply lying when he said he did not know anything about Project 2025. "...for somebody who 'knows nothing', Donald seems quite worried that we're going to find out the truth," Mary wrote. Project 2025 is a 900-page document proposed policies for e future Republican administration but Trump has distanced him from it.
summary: ​Donald Trump's estranged niece Mary Trump said her uncle was simply lying when he said he did not know anything about Project 2025. "...for somebody who 'knows nothing', Donald seems quite worried that we're going to find out the truth," Mary wrote. Project 2025 is a 900-page document proposed policies for e future Republican administration but Trump has distanced him from it.

title: Israeli airstrike aimed at Hamas military chief kills at least 90 Palestinians in Gaza humanitarian zone
'Melania may remain reluctant but won't end her marriage with Donald Trump'
content: Former first lady Melania Trump may remain reluctant and largely missing from Donald Trump's campaigning but this does not hint at any rift between them and Melania will not end her marriage with Trump. Trump's marriage with Melania is the longest for Trump -- his marriage with Ivana lasted for 15 years, with Marla Maples around five years and with Melania 19 years.
summary: Former first lady Melania Trump may remain reluctant and largely missing from Donald Trump's campaigning but this does not hint at any rift between them and Melania will not end her marriage with Trump. Trump's marriage with Melania is the longest for Trump -- his marriage with Ivana lasted for 15 years, with Marla Maples around five years and with Melania 19 years.

title: Tulsi Gabbard says Biden not calling the shots, neither Jill, Hunter are
content: Former Democratic Congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard said the Democrats are squabbling over Joe Biden because they don't care about the country. "They didn't give Democrat voters in that primary an option, but here we find ourselves, as we see all of this inner squabbling happening amongst Democrats and influential people in the Democratic sphere about whether or not Joe Biden should remain the nominee or whether they should swap him out and you look at why this infighting is happening. It's because they don't really care about what's best for the country," Tulsi said.
summary: Former Democratic Congresswoman Tulsi Gabbard said the Democrats are squabbling over Joe Biden because they don't care about the country. "They didn't give Democrat voters in that primary an option, but here we find ourselves, as we see all of this inner squabbling happening amongst Democrats and influential people in the Democratic sphere about whether or not Joe Biden should remain the nominee or whether they should swap him out and you look at why this infighting is happening. It's because they don't really care about what's best for the country," Tulsi said.

title: 'Biden's gaffes are not because of age...': Jill Biden's ex-husband has a theory
content: Jill Biden's ex-husband Bill Stevenson has offered a theory that Biden's gaffes have probably more to do with the "lies" than his age. The "lies" they said about their relationship over the years have made 81-year-old Joe forget what's real and what's not, Bill Stevenson has claimed as Biden's failing health is on the radar amid his series of gaffes ahead of the presidential election.
summary: Jill Biden's ex-husband Bill Stevenson has offered a theory that Biden's gaffes have probably more to do with the "lies" than his age. The "lies" they said about their relationship over the years have made 81-year-old Joe forget what's real and what's not, Bill Stevenson has claimed as Biden's failing health is on the radar amid his series of gaffes ahead of the presidential election.
